title: Has anyone received SOL (DU) study material for this year (BA Hons)? - Quora
tags: School of Open Learning, University of Delhi

response.answer_text: Not Yet ! But confirm through your friends and S.O.L. Office for surety. S.O.L. will notify you through (S.M.S.) Message when procedure of collection of Books will open. Then you have to take your Fee Payment Receipt & I.D. Card to the S.O.L. Office and collect the books.
